title: Yorick NEW SKIN
body: I am probably the only person out there that plays Yorick. and i feel that he doesn't need a rework but what he does need is a new skin the two he has aren't very nice to begin with and i could really go for a new skin and there are hopefully more people out there who feel the same.     {{champion:83}} please riot.

replies.body: He needs a rework far before a new skin.

I read somewhere a while back that they won't be updating or releasing new skins for Yorick before his rework is complete, since he will have skin overhauls at that time and that would only create excess work. You might see one when he is reworked, but unlikely based on recent previous champ reworks.

Worth noting that he should be next off the block for a rework, so his current skins/model should be getting an update soon. :)
Not the only player of yorick, he's just kinda weak outside of laning, when you have a team that doesn't understand what split pushing is, i agree, a new paint job and a new skin or 2 would be nice

he definitely needs a rework.
they might release a new skin along with his rework.
True but I personally like how he is even if it was just a visual update i would be happy.
